title: Watts' Family Chicken and Rice
directions: Mix soup, rice, and milk in a bowl and pour it into a baking pan.
Cube or shred the chicken and place it on top of the mixture. Season.
Cover tightly with foil and bake at 350Â° for 1 hour.
Uncover and bake for 15 minutes or until chicken is done cooking.
ingredients: 2 cans of cream of chicken soup
